00010 // Check against redundant including
00011 #ifndef TT_BUFFER_H
00012 #define TT_BUFFER_H
00013 
00014 // Include appropriate headers
00015 #include "tt_audio_base.h"
00016 
00017 
00018 /********************************************************
00019         CLASS INTERFACE/IMPLEMENTATION
00020 
00021         The entire class is implemented inline for speed.
00022  ********************************************************/
00023 
00024 class tt_buffer:public tt_audio_base{
00025 
00026         private:
00027                 tt_attribute_value                      length_ms;                              // length of the buffer in milliseconds
00028                 bool                                            local_contents;                 // flags true if we are using the internal buffer
00029                                 
00030         public:
00031                 tt_sample_vector                        contents;                               // made public so it can be accessed with speed
00032                 unsigned long                           length_samples;                 // length of the buffer in samples (also available for speed)
00033                 // short                                        channels;
00034                 // attribute_value_discrete     loop_start_file;                // loop start indicated in file
00035                 // attribute_value_discrete     loop_end_file;                  // loop end indicated in file
00036                 
00037                 enum selectors{                                                                         // Attribute Selectors
00038                         k_length_ms,
00039                         k_length_samples,
00040                         
00041                         // waveform selectors
00042                         k_sine,
00043                         k_sine_mod,
00044                         k_cos,
00045                         k_cos_mod,
00046                         k_square,
00047                         k_square_mod,
00048                         k_triangle,
00049                         k_triangle_mod,
00050                         k_ramp,
00051                         k_ramp_mod,
00052                         k_sawtooth,
00053                         k_sawtooth_mod,
00054                         // window selectors
00055                         k_padded_welch_512,
00056                         k_gauss
00057                 };
00058                 
00059                 
00060                 // OBJECT LIFE                                  
00061                 tt_buffer(long val)                                                             // Constructor
00062                 {
00063                         init();
00064                         set_attr(k_length_samples, val);
00065                 }
00066 
00067                 tt_buffer()                                                                             // Constructor
00068                 {
00069                         init();
00070                 }
00071                 
00072                 ~tt_buffer()                                                                            // Destructor
00073                 {
00074                         buffer_free();
00075                 }
00076 
00077 
00078                 // ATTRIBUTES
00079                 void set_attr(tt_selector sel, tt_attribute_value val)  // Set Attributes
00080                 {
00081                         switch (sel){
00082                                 case k_length_ms:
00083                                         length_ms = val;
00084                                         length_samples = long(length_ms * (sr / 1000.0));
00085                                         break;  
00086                                 case k_length_samples:
00087                                         length_samples = ulong(val + 0.49);     // round
00088                                         length_ms = length_samples * (1000.0 / sr);
00089                                         break;
00090                         }
00091                         buffer_free();
00092                         contents = (tt_sample_value *)mem_alloc(length_samples * sizeof(tt_sample_value));
00093                 }
00094 
00095                 tt_attribute_value get_attr(tt_selector sel)                            // Get Attributes
00096                 {
00097                         switch (sel){
00098                                 case k_length_ms:
00099                                         return length_ms;
00100                                 case k_length_samples:
00101                                         return tt_attribute_value(length_samples);
00102                                 default:
00103                                         return 0.0;
00104                         }
00105                 }
00106                 
00107                 
00108                 // METHOD: SET_BUFFER
00109                 void set_buffer(tt_buffer *newbuffer)
00110                 {
00111                         buffer_free();                                                          // release the internal buffer if appropriate
00112                         contents = newbuffer->contents;         // point our contents-pointer to the external one
00113                         length_samples = newbuffer->length_samples;
00114                         length_ms = newbuffer->length_ms;
00115 
00116                         local_contents = false;
00117                 }
00118 
00119 
00120                 // METHOD: PEEK
00121                 tt_sample_value peek(unsigned long index)
00122                 {
00123                         return contents[clip(index, 0UL, length_samples - 1)];
00124                 }
00125                                 
00126                 // METHOD: POKE
00127                 void poke(unsigned long index, tt_sample_value val)
00128                 {
00129                         contents[clip(index, 0UL, length_samples - 1)] = val;
00130                 }
00131 
00132 
00133                 // METHOD: FILL
00134                 void fill(tt_selector sel)
00135                 {
00136                         unsigned long i, j;
00137 
00138                         switch(sel){
00139                                 case k_sine:                                                    // SINE WAVE
00140                                         for(i=0; i < length_samples; i++){
00141                                                 contents[i] = sin(twopi * (double(i) / (double(length_samples) - 1.0)));
00142                                                 // post("FILL: %f", contents[i]);               
00143                                         }                       
00144                                         break;                          
00145                                 case k_sine_mod:                                                        // (modulator version: ranges from 0 to 1)
00146                                         for(i=0; i < length_samples; i++){
00147                                                 contents[i] = 0.5 + (0.5 * sin(twopi * (double(i) / (double(length_samples) - 1.0))));
00148                                         }
00149                                         break;
00150                                         
00151                                 case k_cos:                                                             // COSINE WAVE
00152                                         for(i=0; i < length_samples; i++)
00153                                                 contents[i] = cos(twopi * (double(i) / (double(length_samples) - 1.0)));
00154                                         break;                                  
00155                                 case k_cos_mod:                                                         // (modulator version)
00156                                         for(i=0; i < length_samples; i++)
00157                                                 contents[i] = 0.5 + (0.5 * cos(twopi * (double(i) / (double(length_samples) - 1.0))));
00158                                         break;
00159                                         
00160                                 case k_square:                                                  // SQUARE WAVE (not band-limited)
00161                                         for(i=0; i < (length_samples / 2); i++)
00162                                                 contents[i] = 1.0;                              
00163                                         for(i=i; i < length_samples; i++)
00164                                                 contents[i] = -1.0;     
00165                                         break;                                  
00166                                 case k_square_mod:                                                      // (modulator version)
00167                                         for(i=0; i < (length_samples / 2); i++)
00168                                                 contents[i] = 1.0;                              
00169                                         for(i=i; i < length_samples; i++)
00170                                                 contents[i] = 0.0;      
00171                                         break;
00172                                         
00173                                 case k_triangle:                                                // TRIANGLE WAVE (not band-limited)
00174                                         for (i=0; i < (length_samples / 4); i++) 
00175                                                 contents[i] = float(i) / (length_samples / 4);
00176                                         for (j=i-1; i < (length_samples / 2); i++, j--) 
00177                                                 contents[i] = contents[j];
00178                                         for (j=0; i < length_samples; i++, j++) 
00179                                                 contents[i] = 0.0 - contents[j];
00180                                         break;                          
00181                                 case k_triangle_mod:                                            // (modulator version)
00182                                         for (i=0; i < (length_samples / 4); i++) 
00183                                                 contents[i] = 0.5 + float(i) / (length_samples / 2);
00184                                         for (j=i-1; i < (length_samples / 2); i++, j--) 
00185                                                 contents[i] = contents[j];
00186                                         for (j=0; i < length_samples; i++, j++) 
00187                                                 contents[i] = 1.0 - contents[j];
00188                                         break;                          
00189                                         
00190                                 case k_ramp:                                                    // RAMP WAVE
00191                                         for (i=0; i < length_samples; i++) 
00192                                                 contents[i] = -1.0 + (2.0 * (float(i) / length_samples));
00193                                         break;
00194                                 case k_ramp_mod:                                                        // (modulator version)
00195                                         for (i=0; i < length_samples; i++) 
00196                                                 contents[i] = float(i) / length_samples;
00197                                         break;
00198 
00199                                 case k_sawtooth:                                                        // SAWTOOTH WAVE
00200                                         for(i=0, j=length_samples-1; i < length_samples; i++)
00201                                                 contents[j--] = -1.0 + (2.0 * (float(i) / length_samples));
00202                                         break;
00203                                 case k_sawtooth_mod:                                                    // (modulator version)
00204                                         for(i=0, j=length_samples-1; i < length_samples; i++)
00205                                                 contents[j--] = float(i) / length_samples;
00206                                         break;
00207 
00208                                 case k_padded_welch_512:                                // FIXED 512 POINT WINDOW OF THE PADDED WELCH TYPE
00209                                         for(i=0; i < 256; i++)
00210                                                 contents[i] = tt_audio_base::lookup_half_paddedwelch[i];
00211                                         for(j=i-1; i < 512;i++, j--){
00212                                                 contents[i] = tt_audio_base::lookup_half_paddedwelch[j];
00213                                         }       
00214                                         break;
00215                         }
00216                 }
00217 
00218                 // METHOD: FILL
00219                 void fill(tt_selector sel, tt_attribute_value param1, tt_attribute_value param2)
00220                 {
00221                         unsigned long   i;
00222                         double  temp;
00223                         
00224                         switch(sel){
00225                                 case k_gauss:                                                   // GAUSSIAN
00226                                         for(i=0; i < length_samples; i++){
00227                                                 temp = double(i) / (double(length_samples) - 1);
00228                                                 contents[i] = ((-1.0 * (temp - param2) * (temp - param2)) / (2 * param1 * param1)) / (param1 * sqrt(twopi));
00229                                                 contents[i] = contents[i] * 0.3133;     // scale it
00230                                                 //post("FILL: %f", contents[i]);
00231                                         }
00232                                         break;
00233 
00234                         }
00235                 }
00236 
00237                 // METHOD: INIT
00238                 void init()
00239                 {
00240                         local_contents = true;
00241                         contents = 0;
00242                         length_ms = 0;
00243                         length_samples = 0;             
00244                 }
00245 
00246 
00247                 // METHOD: BUFFER_FREE
00248                 void buffer_free()
00249                 {
00250                         if(local_contents){
00251                                 mem_free(contents);
00252                                 contents = 0;
00253                         }       
00254                 }
00255 
00256 
00257                 // METHOD: CLEAR
00258                 void clear()
00259                 {
00260                         unsigned long i;
00261                         if(contents){
00262                                 for(i=0; i < length_samples; i++)
00263                                         contents[i] = 0.0;
00264                         }
00265                 }
00266                 
00267 };
00268 
00269 
00270 #endif          // tt_BUFFER_H
